review_text: loved the experience!

We loved our stay at Anne’s. Staying in a grain silo was so unique (especially for me, New Englander). Our suite was so clean. It had everything we needed for a perfect overnight. The furnishings were tasteful and the bed was so comfortable. The views from the living room and upstairs out to the Lake were beautiful, the grounds perfectly manicured and we loved our stay in Alexandria. I would go back in a heartbeat.
Great place for a weekend getaway! Experience exactly as described. Staying in the Luxury Grain Bin was great. Super clean, beautifully put together, great views. Highly recommended!
Great getaway! Extremely peaceful to spend a couple nights. Will definitely visit again!
Such a cool place to stay the night! Great location, too!

Anne has a beautiful clean place. We loved being able to just hang out and relax for the weekend. Located far enough out of the city to be quiet but close enough to shopping and dining if that’s more your thing too. We look forward to booking Anne’s place again and highly recommend it for a weekend getaway.

This was a great cozy experience! Everything was super clean and decorated with simplistic beauty!!!
We enjoyed an area restaurant eith great food for our anniversary. We both felt in tune with the uniqueness of the silos and wpuld definitely come agsin!!!
This place was absolutely beautiful and peaceful! We enjoyed our stay!
Great place just to get away!
We enjoyed our stay, wonderful place!

This place met our expectations, we were in the luxury suite 2 story grain bin, it was clean and easy to get into, we did not see anyone the entire time we were there expect for the people waiting to clean our room promptly at 11am when we checked out. The scenery was stunning and beautiful, we did not know it was a wedding venue, so it was fun walking around and exploring the property, swinging on the swings and walking down the aisle, it looks like a magical place for a wedding. No one was around so it felt as if we had the whole place to ourselves. If your looking for a place that is quiet, secluded, and beautiful, I would recommend this place, the novelty of sleeping in a grain bin was charming.
My husband and I had a great experience here. It was nice and cozy. We really enjoyed and loved our stay here. We definitely want to come back.
Great location! Close to the brewery/winery and just a short drive into town. Very cute and quaint space. Would definitely stay here again.
It was a fun and different place to stay.

What a peaceful and unique place to stay! We sure enjoyed staying in the grain bins along with two other couples. Don’t miss out on this one if you are coming to the Alexandria area. Thanks for everything! Kathy
This space was just as described, the property is beautiful and so peaceful, just what I was looking for as a nice little relaxing getaway.
Our stay was absolutely perfect! This air b’n’b was beautiful & exactly what we were looking for! Definitely recommend for a fun get away!
I have stayed here before & loved it but this experience didn’t live up to those expectations. Anne addressed the issues & we would definitely return!
Cute place. Super quiet and peaceful. Great night of sleep. Close to a local winery/brewery. Close enough to town where restaurants are a quick drive. Great experience!

Only hiccup was lack of clear instructions on how to enter the room, but that was not really Anne's fault. She responded to a call right away and I was able to get in. Such a peaceful setting to roam around a bit and the property is so close to Carlos Creek winery- made a great night to celebrate my BFF's 40th. Our room was clean, simply and tastefully decorated and had lots of bright sunlight. I would definitely come back!
This was the cutest place for our anniversary getaway! The grain bins are so unique. The location was perfect-close to the winery and other restaurants for us to enjoy!

The Silo was very unique! This was a comfortable and very quiet place.
We really enjoyed the experience and told all our friends about it!!
We booked this room for our parents wedding anniversary and they had a great time! Even my father in law loved it, and he's not always easy to please!
Really liked this place, unique, very well built
Cute place to stay!!

Beautiful, charming, relaxing, comfortable, super clean. Loved the Gathered Oaks venue and we arrived early to make sure we didn’t miss sunset! Beauty was delivered! Bed was so comfortable and so were the linens. We were hungry and hit the jackpot on Tuesday night there was wood fired pizza and included a delicious gluten free option with draft root beer at their bar plus live music! We will definitely be back! The bonus was meeting Anne, David, and grandkids who were adorable and delightful!

A unique and charming spot, and a great experience overall. It was a seamless process getting checked in and very easy to get our bearings. The only downside was not having any cups for the coffee and tea provided, and a couple bottles of water wouldn't have been amiss given the water from the tap seemed hard, but I imagine we could have gotten them if we'd asked--we were just too busy enjoying the beautiful surroundings to want to bother anyone. :) Would definitely recommend!

We loved our stay in the suite. Amazingly bright and comfortable Bring your own dishes if you plan on eating your own food. Only paper cups for coffee. Would have loved a small table and chairs upstairs to sit by the windows. Views are incredible
Beautiful and unique venue that is perfect for a getaway from the cities! The grain bins are further in the country, while still being close enough to the local shops and restaurants!
So unique. It was clean and very well put together. We absolutely loved it. Thank you so much.

This place has been on my bucket list ever since I read about it when it opened. We were so impressed at how creatively they remodeled the grain bins into such luxurious rooms! The whole area was so beautiful & peaceful. We also enjoyed hiking at Lake Carlos State Park & an afternoon at Carlos Creek Winery. We highly recommend this venue! The only thing we were disappointed by is the inability to open the windows at night (the hand cranks were removed). It was such gorgeous spring weather, & being by the lake, we really looked forward to enjoying the sounds of nature, & letting the cool evening breeze in. Instead we were closed in -- bummer.

I can’t express how beautiful and unique this Grain Bin experience was. It exceeded our expectations. We celebrated our wedding anniversary and what an experience to remember. We will for sure stay there again. Don’t hesitate to book your next vacation there !! Thanks Anne - Gathered Oaks for truly a unique experience. We have spread the word to family and friends already!
This is a beautiful place to stay and very unique and unforgettable. Everything was perfect!! Highly recommend and would stay again if in the area.

We enjoyed our stay! The place was charming and clean. It was easy to find. The bed was very comfortable. We only regret that the weather prevented us from using the deck and walking around a bit....guess we'll have to do that next time!

My husband and I got married at gathered oaks a year ago. We were able to stay in the bins for our one year anniversary. Everything was perfect. Anne was a great host! The grain bins are very unique and a fun place to stay.
What a unique and great location. We enjoyed the peace and privacy and the beginning of spring with the sunshine and geese calling!

It was a unique experience staying in the converted silo! The setting was peaceful and gorgeous, even in winter. I would probably book just a regular room next time, though the comfy chairs were nice for watching the sunset.
We had a relaxing stay and enjoyed the uniqueness of the grain bin suite! Very nice interior and the view and surroundings are very peaceful.
We loved staying here! We cannot wait to book another trip here and visit the winery again! Beautiful place.
Beautiful place!

Great location, we stayed one night for a quick getaway. Close to state park and other parks for winter hiking, skiing, and snowshoeing, lots of options for food and drink in the area and close enough to Alexandria to make a morning coffee run.

This is a beautifully refurbished grain silo turned Airbnb!
Check in was easy, we had a stunning view of sunset, everything was clean and cozy, and check out was also a breeze.
Our only complaint was that the shower head could not be well adjusted for the height of the person in the shower.
All in all, a lovely place to stay that we would definitely visit again.
Well worth our money! Such a unique Airbnb and beautifully decorated! A perfect little getaway!
Beautiful & unique place. Would 100% recommend and would stay again.
Wonderful getaway spot. Ideal for one or two night stay.

My farmer husband was excited to stay in a grain bin! A fun experience for the both of us. We woke up to a frosted winter landscape with their beautiful trees just outside our window. It was a clean place and easy to get to. Very friendly and helpful host.

Amazing place to stay to relax! Was very quiet and peaceful. Super cozy and beautiful scenery! Everything clean, just as the pictures, and free of clutter. Would recommended #8 for extra space and sitting chairs for sure.
Great place to stay for a quiet private getaway!
Great place!
Thanks for a great experience!

Our grain bin experience was wonderful! Was a perfect way to celebrate our anniversary and disconnect from busyness & relax. The suite was a great, fun & different experience. Anne was professional, timely and pleasant. No complaints, would recommend to others.
Charming Midwest experience. Be sure to check out the Carlos Winery down the road.

What a beautiful place to stay in Alexandria! I loved not only the uniqueness of the grain bins, but the proximity to one of my favorite places, Carlos Creek Winery and the 22 Northmen Brewery. The suite was clean, classy, and Anne's communication for check-in were on par. Guests should know that the grain bins sit on a property called Gathered Oaks and the owners do host events in their other attractive buildings. This means there may be traffic and other outdoor events happening when you stay. Guests should also know that the kitchenette includes only a microwave, refrigerator (no freezer section) and a sink. There were paper cups, coffee, a few snacks, and tea. There were not other utensils such as glasses, silverware, or dishes for use- so plan accordingly. Overall we enjoyed our stay and plan to be back again!
Great place for a nice getaway! the suite was so pretty and we enjoyed having the separate living space. such a cool place to stay! close to town with lots of options for dinner!
Great location and very comfortable accomodations. Just down the road from the Arrow wood conference center so it's a good option if you want to stay offsite or if the hotel is booked.
It's a creative use of space and has a great view. Bonus: it's super quiet!!
Wonderful venue. I stayed in the #8 bin and enjoyed the ambience.
Great stay! Very clean and unique!!
We loved the suite! Very nice and well done rooms.
We had a great stay; the accommodations were great; communication with Ann was easy and quick with responses. Would highly recommend
Very much enjoyed my stay in this unique space on beautiful property. Quick access to downtown Alexandria. Very responsive and accommodating hosts.

What a beautiful and serene location. The grounds were meticulously maintained and the accommodations were unique and comfortable. We had a wonderful time at the farm.
⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

We loved it!
My wife and I met our senior year of high school at church camp in Alexandria. This was a surprise for her birthday and our 5th wedding anniversary. She loved it!
As soon as we arrived the place just felt peaceful! Such a beautiful location! Very easy check in and out!
Thanks for the great stay Anne!
Looking forward to being back in the future!
Loved our stay here!! So cute, cozy, and clean. Had a great time at Carlos Creek Winery nearby.

What a fun and unique getaway. The luxury suite was so comfortable and roomy. It is a 2 story unit. The main floor is living room/ kitchenette and sleeping/bathroom on the 2nd floor. The deck off #8 was a great place to sit and read, drink morning coffee, play games and listen to the live music on Tuesday nights.
If you are planning to eat there be sure and bring your own plates, utensils etc. There are paper coffee cups but that is it.
Clean, cozy and cute! We will be back!
Our stay at the. Oaks was wonderful! We enjoyed our suite and private deck. We were there on Tuesday so pizza, cocktails and music were a bonus!

The perfect getaway at a unique property! The grain bins were so fun, clean, and easy to get to. The whole property was beautiful and just a quick drive from winery/brewery, downtown Alexandria, and walking paths. 10/10 recommend for couples or friends looking for a quick escape!

We have stayed at this location two years in a row and absolutely LOVE it. I love the unique design of the grain bins. The property is clean and quiet. It makes the perfect weekend getaway from our crazy lives. Anne is so amazing to work with and extremely accommodating. This is definitely a Minnesota must do!

Beautiful place, clean and very fun to stay in. However, had to finally contact Airbnb late on the night before our reservation for door code information as did not receive the code and host did not respond to inquires. Since we were making a special trip just to stay at the bins, this made the trip stressful.

Such a beautiful and welcoming space for my partner and I. Loved the privacy of the space and the amazing evening views. Additionally, we forgot to pack snacks and the granola bars and tea prepped by the hosts was a life saver. I definitely recommend folks to wander towards the lake and grassy area to enjoy some nature. 10/10 recommend - the ambiance and amenities were beyond what I expected - especially since they had live music and delicious brick oven pizzas when we booked. The hosts were lovey and welcoming, didn’t make me or my partner feel uncomfortable, and were super responsive. A super hot spot that deserves so much more attention for the quality and price of the bnb.

We loved our stay here! We stayed in the honeymoon suite on our honeymoon and it was so cozy and comfy! Went to the brewery and winery up the road and relaxed on the deck outside! Would stay here again!

Just as advertised. We only spent one night there, but it was perfect! Beautiful location, easy access to food in town. Unique stay, clean place. Good communication with Anne. Would definitely stay again!

Bucket list item that probably is not on your list. So unique. Close to great restaurants, winery, and brewery. Anne was great host and the whole property was a gem. Stayed in #8 the two floor suite but each room was nice. Highly recommend!

This place is beautiful and our stay was wonderful! We celebrated our one year anniversary of getting married at Gathered Oaks by staying in the grain bins on-site. A perfect stay to reminisce our special day.
Wonderful place to stay and relax. Also, there is a vineyard, micro-brewery, wood fired pizza place just about a mile down the road. This was a great place to stay.
This location is gorgeous! They did an amazing job renovating the grain bins. Cozy, modern vibe. Very clean, comfy bed & beautiful place to walk around. We’ll def be staying again!!!
Absolutely wonderful experience at the grain bins! So cozy and beautiful the perfect relaxing get away!
The bins and property are amazing! Anne was great to work with. The check in was easy and our stay was fantastic.
We only stayed one night, but it was amazing! So beautiful and also one of the cleanest places I have stayed in!
We loved our stay here and the uniqueness of staying in the grain bin! Wonderful hosts!

We had a wonderful weekend and will likely come back. Highly recommended. It's hard to believe that they did this with grain bins. You get a warm and cozy feeling as soon as you walk inside. The wood and industrial feel is beautiful and there is a lot of attention to detail. They are truly unique and luxurious as stated. Anne (the host) was very responsive and kind and made us feel welcome before we even got there.
We stayed in the suite. It was a wonderful spot for a weekend getaway - quiet & cozy, and close to restaurants & stores.
We had a wonderful time! So cozy, relaxing and peaceful! Anne was a great host and so understanding when we had to reschedule due to the weather. We will definitely be back!
My boyfriend & I thoroughly enjoyed our overnight stay. Anne was an easy & wonderful person to communicate with. Even when the weather was unexpected we still enjoy the silo views & interior.
There were many highlights to this stay, but the main mentions are: the bin was very easy to access, the granola and Nutri Grain bars were a nice feature, and the bed was very comfortable.
Gorgeous place! The grain bins are so cozy and tastefully decorated. The bed and sheets were comfy and provided a perfect night’s sleep.

I can't recommend this space enough! We stayed in the suite and it was decorated so cute. It was clean, she left us some snacks and it was the perfect winter getaway. The space is cozy and super unique. I'd also recommend checking out Carlos Creek Winery. It is super close and the winery is next to a brewery and pizza place!

This place is a super cool stay! Unique aesthetic and very relaxing. A bad snowstorm moved in overnight and the luxury suite was the perfect place to hunker down. The host was extremely nice and let us know that she had a snow-clearing service coming, and when it would be there. We'll definitely be back again in the future. Recommend eating at both "Pike and Pint", and "Lure Lakebar".

Beautiful aesthetic & cozy space. Highly suggest upgrading to the 2-floor suite (at least in the winter). The listing says there is a kitchen, but is missing basic kitchen amenities (plates, cups, mugs, utensils). Plan accordingly :)
We loved this spot & would love to return in summer to utilize the lake & fire pit!
A super sweet little getaway that is still close to the amenities of Alexandria. Spotless and quaint.
Another great stay! Thank you
Beautiful setting close to everything

It’s a very nice, clean, and unique place to stay. Anne was great with answering any and all questions I had prior to, during, and even after the reservation.
A perfect location for a relaxing little getaway.
Unique experience!
Great and unique place to stay!

We’ve been to quite a few unique AirBnB’s over the past few years, and this was one of our favorites. Space itself was even more impressive in person than it’s pictured, as was the entire grounds actually. Anne was wonderful to communicate with and even helped save the night of my 50th birthday by getting us in a night early after an unfortunate AirBnB check in experience earlier that day. Sometimes things work out for a reason. Spent the day at the Bold North Cellars grounds right down the road with a winery/brewery/pizza kitchen that was great too. Highly, highly recommend. We’ll definitely be back!
We loved staying here, the place was clean, and beautiful. It was so amazing, would definitely recommend to others.
An amazing suite that is perfect for a getaway from reality. Anne’s grain bins are the perfect location in Alexandria and we will be there again!
This place was even better than the pictures! We walked the grounds and there was just one cool thing after another! Really enjoyed our time here, was very peaceful!!
If I could give them 100 stars I would. Amazing in every way. We’ll surely be back!
What a beautiful, fun, peaceful place to stay! We were in Grain Bin 8 which had an amazing view and was decorated beautifully. Perfectly located in Alexandria. Would highly recommend!!

Great space and definitely worth paying for the suite otherwise the rooms aren’t very spacious. Microwave, shelves for prepping (no table), iron and board, wine opener, coffee maker, and mini fridge (no freezer section). Shower was a little hard to use since the shower head is aimed at the back wall and won’t adjust lower. A little pricey when it comes to the additional service charges (we stayed one night and it cost over $200). Air conditioning works extremely well. Anne did a great job communicating with us on what to do for check in. Would stay here again.
Our honeymoon stay here was perfect! It’s a lovely place and so unique.
Awesome place to stay!!!

It was extremely relaxing and enjoying. My wife and I said we should have gotten married there also :). We will definitely recommend to others. The lake was beautiful. Also there's a lot of good food in town. Thank you again. We will be back

We stayed in Grain Bin 8 and found it to be quite the gem. One of the most unique AirBNB rentals we have found. Anne was very attentive with anything we needed. We loved the luxury suite, with two levels of space. The windows provide wonderful natural light and the view of the property and pond was beautiful. The private deck was especially nice and spacious. Guests should know that the advertised amenity of a kitchenette for preparing your own meals is actually just a mini fridge and microwave, and you need to bring your own plates, silverware, etc. Overall, we were very pleased and will stay again.
We were able to enjoy the beautiful sunset right from room, it was gorgeous!
Super clean! Cute as can be! Loved the big comfy bed and pretty views! Would love to go back sometime!
Fun and awesome place to stay!
What a neat property! Thanks for a great stay!
Such a clean and cute place!!! Was a perfect spot for a little weekend getaway close to home!
Will come back!! They were amazing💜 such a cool getaway!

This place is the perfect getaway spot. I highly recommend it if you are looking for a night or some time away. Anne was a great communicator as well and gave thoughtful recommendations on restaurants. The bed was also very comfortable.
These are so unique and love the secluded lot the AirBnB sits on. Everything was perfect and was a great little retreat away for a couple of nights. I will definitely be back again!
Great place to stay!
Perfect little winter getaway! Fun, beautiful space. :-) thanks!

Absolutely amazing. If you get a chance to stay here, take it! Perfect and romantic with amazing views of the sunset. Anne was so quick to respond and they even came and jumped my car when my battery died in -26 degrees!! Couldn’t give a better review!
Great place to stay
It's a very unique stay. We were impressed with the cleanliness and how beautifully decorated it was. We suggest Bin #8!

Our stay in this place was amazing! It was freaking cold outside so being inside this cosy place was such a pleasure. It looks very modern and nice, and the fact that you live inside the bin feels unique! Anne is such a great host. She responded so quickly, I didn’t have unanswered questions. We will definitely come back in summer, when it’s not that cold.
This place is so neat! Anne was quick with responses to our questions and kept an open line of communication. The grain bin suite was really cozy and made our stay enjoyable. Would totally recommend!

This place is adorable and unique. If you plan on using the little kitchenette, make sure you have silverware, paper too, etc. It'd be great if they provided some tips on places to eat, things to do, and places that deliver. It was very clean and the view was great!
Great stay! Unique design and super comfortable, and Anne is a great host!

Super fun, simple, and cute space. My husband and I really enjoyed this little get away just far enough away from the cities but not too much of a drive. I highly recommend this place for a fun, unique stay. Our bin had a great view of the lake and open fields.
Excellent place to stay! Anne is awesome to work with and made our experience great! Would recommend

Anne was very punctual in her responses to all my questions. My husband is a farmer and really enjoyed my surprise grain bin/silo B&B. The space was very clean, modern, and cozy. It was the perfect oasis for our anniversary and would love to visit again in the summer/fall (instead of the cold winter). The area looks beautiful!
This was such a cute little place for a couple day get away! Anne was very responsive and made check in and check out very easy! Definitely recommend staying here!!
It’s better than you think. More beautiful than you’re ready for and beds that made it way too hard to get up in the morning! We can’t wait to get back!
Great spot! Wonderful touches will be back

We’ve stayed in so many places internationally and this was one of our favorites!! Check-in was super simple and the communication was perfect before, during, and after the stay. The apartment itself was immaculate and everything was simple, comfortable, and relaxing. The solitude during the sunset was amazing. Honestly we couldn’t have asked for more and will very likely stay there again!
Great place, would recommend!
A very unique place to stay. Everyone should try it!
Such a cute and cozy place for a great weekend get away! This is such a unique and incredible place to stay its safe to say we will definitely be back to visit again!
Stunning! One of my most aesthetically pleasing stays. Felt very private and quiet, and the lookout level was so unique. Wish I could have stayed longer, but I took plenty of pictures home with me :)
We had a great night! Loved the suite. Bathroom was a little small, but not an issue
Beautiful place! I would stay here again!
What a lovely find! The suite was spotless and well designed comfortable. Really enjoyed my time there. The site manager was super quick to respond to queries and the grounds and really beautiful.
Very cool space! We enjoyed our stay. Super clean, great location, loved the sparse decor.
What a great place! Be sure to also check out Lake Carlos State Park, Carlos Creek Winery, Mi Mexico, La Ferme, and more.
Great hospitality! Great staycation for our minimoon! We loved it and would definitely come back! Thanks to the hostess for all the fun tips! We enjoyed our stay in Alexandria!

Amazing place for a family to stay with adult children and spouses. Place to hang together in the beautiful cozy and warm home or spread out. Everything we needed and very responsive to us and our requests! Close to lots of things to do in the area. Would love to stay again.

The house is amazing !! I stayed here over a month and truly didn’t want to leave,
It got everything you can ask for! Amazing yard with luxury pool, BBQ station, billiard table and huge master-bedroom with red light jacuzzi!
Great location pretty close to the strip and great host that helped with everything I needed, I will definitely come back there !

Great place to stay very beautiful log home with private wooded surrounding the house. Only 15mins to the town for groceries and different activities. Ryan was great in communication and made our check-in and out very easy.
We had a great stay. The lake was very clear and fishing was good. The cabin had everything we needed. Very clean. Highly recommend and will look to book again when we are back in the area!

The cabin was very clean and cozy. It was in a good location in the town and had beautiful lake views. The hosts were very responsive. The cabin is pretty cozy and having 5 people in this cabin felt crowded; maybe 4 people should be the max.

What a fantastic spot to stay! We had a great time while staying! Scott and Richelle have the perfect little spot to stay at while visiting Alexandria. The coffee bar was amazing and well thought out. The beds were comfy and the cabin is adorable. Definitely will be staying again while visiting Alexandria!! Thank you for your wonderful hospitality Scott and Richelle!
great little Cabin for our short stay.
Very cute, with welcoming decor. Really loved all of the coffee bar options.

We had a great stay at the Lake
House! Thanks for being such attentive hosts!
Cute little lake cabin that was perfect for a girls weekend. The layout next to the lake was awesome!
Great mini getaway! Scott & Richelle took care of the minor challenge we had during our stay, greatly and quickly. Loved bonfires by the lake.
this was my second stay at the lake house on Geneva. I would stay forever if I could. I've seen it in fall and late winter so far. cant wait to see it in spring and summer.

Charming lake house perfect for my weekend stay. Space is accurate to pictures. Clean and well maintained-absolutely ready to host guests at check-in. There was traffic and train activity, but reasonable considering the location of the lake house. One morning witnessed a beautiful sunrise with the sun reflection on the water!
Scott and Richelle-thank you for your attention to the little details, they are what truly make this space lovely and so welcoming!
Good place

Sweet cabin with a spectacular view of the lake. Loved waking up to the sunrise. Well stocked kitchen perfect for whipping up meals and first Airbnb I’ve been to with an impressive coffee bar situation. It was also easy for us to get into town and explore.
Great place to unwind, very relaxing. Great instructions and communication. Would love to stay again.
Had a great weekend with the guys ice fishing. The lake house was beautiful. Super easy to find and get settled in. The firepit os in the perfect spot! Had a wonderful time.
In town on business and the sweet cabin made it feel like vacation.
Very cozy, very cute cabin
A very unique spot in the winter, very conducive to fishing!

Our family of 5 LOVED staying here! The location is ideal and easy to find. The central heat works wonderfully considering the freezing temps outside. They had a really nice coffee bar with flavor syrups, French press, pour over and drip. Toiletry, shampoo conditioner and body wash items were available. We are from florida so the frozen lake was a nice surprise and we were able to enjoy the outside fire in the meantime. We also had never seen ‘fire starter’ which was readily available. We were also surprised by the intermittent train throughout the evening, it added to our ambiance. The internet and t.v worked great, no issues, and plenty of board games. There was laundry det and fab softener so we could run a load of laundry and plenty of spices and kitchen items to cook with as well! (Wine bottle opener (get alcohol ahead of time), can opener, dishes, plates, cups, pots/pans, knives and utensils, plenty of paper towers) Thanks for being great hosts! We will surely return!

Scott and Richelle are very professional - clear instructions and great communication, but also friendly and flexible. The cabin has nice amenities and a great coffee nook. The place is small, but nicely equipped, very clean and has a beautiful view of Lake Geneva. We had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the board games provided and the coziness of the cabin. We greatly appreciated the hosts’ efforts and care in making this such a nice weekend retreat.
Beautiful view of the lake. Home was updated and very clean. Scott and Richelle were great to work with and very responsive. Definitely will stay again!
Adorable cabin, beautiful view. Hosts are extremely responsive to questions. We loved our weekend and hope to be back.
Very nice place to stay, exactly as advertised!
This cabin was the perfect getaway, and I plan on staying here many more times.
hosts were very nice and easy to work with, Kitchen was clean and very usable. Bathroom and beds are old cabin style

What a cute, relaxing, cozy cabin on the lake. The nice warm cabin and lovely lake views welcomed us upon our visit. Open family room is great for a small family or a couple getaway. Cabin was well decorated and appointed with basic needs or entertainment whims. It is close to road/train tracks but is tucked away/fenced so you feel far from it all while sitting around the fire pit looking at the stars over a crystal glass lake. We had a lovely stay.
We enjoyed our time! The cabin was easy find and check in. It was clean, lovely, and had beautiful views. It was a perfect place for our family to get away!
Great cabin in a great location. Rooms are small, but the cabin is very nice and updated.

Scott and Richelle were great hosts. Everything was well communicated and the cabin was very clean. It’s on a busy road, just a bit noisy for my liking but a super cute cabin and the lake was absolutely beautiful!

Very Personal, felt like we walked into a family cabin. Has everything we needed and more. Coffee bar was impressive! Even hot chocolate and cider for the kids. Spent the morning playing board games which we haven’t done for years. Very peaceful and close to anything you want to do.
Soft toilet paper = thoughtful host = great stay. Also the view from the sofa is a total vibe 10/10
Great place I bet it’d be amazing in the summer time!!

Lovely - clean - beautifully decorated - great view of the lake - and the coffee selections and availability of multiple options was outstanding and sooooo much appreciated. Never have I ever been able to make myself a cup of coffee of my choosing in the morning at an AirBnB!!!
Would have liked a heads up about the train.
This place is absolutely stunning - && they truly thought of everything! The owners were very responsive & helpful.
Super cute place, lots of thought was put into the decorations. Hosts were very communicative and friendly. Loved the water view, had a wonderful time!
I had a very nice stay here. Cabin was clean and had new updates. Very easy communicating with Scott and Richelle. Very quite and relaxing stay!
So perfect! Loved it!!!
Perfect cabin for a weekend away on an awesome chain of lakes for fishing. The hosts were very friendly.

Stayed at the cabin because I was working in the area. My wife came with me so I was looking for something for her to be comfortable and relaxing. It was that and she enjoyed it to. Very peaceful and felt like home.
My sisters and I really enjoyed our stay. The home met our expectations and more. It was a nice location and very relaxing.

We had an incredible time. Greeted with a cute welcome sign and the view of the lake was gorgeous. Spent most of our time by the fire and fishing. A nice and cozy spot for your family. Thank you Scott and Richelle for your hospitality.
My husband and I loved this place. It was peaceful and relaxing. The only thing we didn't like was that we didn't stay longer, but there's always next time.
My friends and I had a wonderful time staying at this beautiful cabin and the hosts had great communication!
It's a nice, quiet place; very welcoming and cozy. Had a good time.

It was our first family vacation with our newborn son and we absolutely loved it. Amazing view, super close to the town, beautiful cabin design and great fishing spots. Will be definitely coming back.

Great hosts and great place. Centrally located, clean and comfortable.
beautiful home and well furnished. great location and lot! no complaints!

Loved this lakeside home!! Comfortable, clean, plenty of sleeping and social space and wonderful kitchen. Loved the fire pit and the lakeshore view. Alexandria is a charming town with lots to offer!! Will definitely be back!

Cleanest place we've ever stayed and the layout is perfect. Incredible!
This place was amazing. Right in town and close to everything. Davis was a wonderful host and very responsive. I would definitely recommend this place if you are the area!
Very gracious host. Beautiful, clean cabin and a lovely stay!

This was an amazing experience. The host went above and beyond for us.

Very nice and well-furnished house. Our dogs were welcome which was a big bonus. Weather was not great so we didn't get to use the lake as much as we would have liked but seems like a peaceful small lake. Would be nice to have easier access to the lake and a dock to throw a fishing line from.
We will definitely consider returning for another stay

The listing was great and the owner was super responsive and accommodating. Everything was clean and as advertised. The wifi speed worked well for those in my group who needed to do some work. Beds were very comfortable. Best Airbnb I've stayed at yet.

Great place to stay while fishing in the area. Well-kept and comfortable.

We enjoyed our business trip and made it feel like home still all while working. We loved the house and every thing in it. Very well kept! Hosts did exactly what they needed to to succeeded with this property very pretty place. Will be back!

Home was so nice!

The cabin was a wonderful place to relax! It was very clean and quiet. Lovely to look out at the lake. The house was spacious for our group of 9. A perfect retreat and close to Lake Carlos State Park, Carlos Creek Winery, and downtown Alexandria.

A very well stocked house with comfy beds, really great furniture and very clean! The host was very nice to call and let me know I left something behind and was very accommodating for me to pick it up later.

The home was very well stocked and quite welcoming. The games and the kayaks added to the experience. I enjoyed the use of the kayaks and my granddaughter had a lot of fun with the hungry hippos game. I would not hesitate to stay here again if ever in this area in the future.
We had a great stay in Alex. The home was very clean and well stocked with kitchen tools we needed for cooking as a family!

Awesome home. Was just for my wife and I on a getaway so we had an abundant amount of space. Love the area and all the lake life culture in this area. Carlos Winery just a few miles away was a rave of a find.

The house is perfect and their is lots of space . The furniture is all high end and very comfortable . My kids had a great time fishing. it was great

Beautiful place!

Such an amazing place! The pictures almost don't do it justice! The lake was beautiful and the kids had a great time jumping off the swimming platform and paddling the kayaks around. We had an amazing time at this wonderfully homey and charming house on the location. This place is amazing! We had 8 people and had plenty of space. The beds are very comfortable, the house and property are super clean and well appointed. The location is great too. We can't wait to come back.

Wonderful vacation home. We enjoyed the yard games.

Lots of things to do on the lake and on land, for young and old in our group. Had a great four night stay and would love to go back! Host was great! And the house was a nice big space for our immediate family of 11.

We could tell it was going to be a great stay as soon as we walked in. Krysta was a great communicator and assisted us in handling unforeseen circumstances. She was very accommodating in letting us check in early. It was the peaceful gateway we needed to relax and unwind. Even in the Minnesota cold, we enjoyed taking morning walks and watching the sunset. A wonderful place to stay!

When I first found the Lake House on Lake Miltona on AirBnB, it seemed almost too good to be true. But everything was spot on as described.
Krysta is a thoughtful, gracious host and the space is amazing—even in December. Great lake views, spacious—yet warm—home with all necessary amenities (kitchen is awesome). The setting is quiet and somewhat secluded but you are close to restaurants, shops, etc.
Definitely worth a reservation and visit any time of year!
Had the most wonderful girls weekend! Beautiful house and great location.

Krysta's place is way better in person; pictures don't do it justice. The area is good for those looking for a place to relax but town/shopping is just 20 min away. The place is spacious, very modern, and well equipped. This place was perfect for our girl's weekend; can't wait to go back next time we need a gateway.
Beautiful, brand new, great space for a fun weekend away! A perfect stay!
great place!

The A-frame cabin was perfection! Krysta and her partner literally thought of everything to ensure families and groups have an meaningful and comfortable stay. Check in process was smooth and easy as we only needed to enter with a code. Host was very responsive and made sure our needs were met. My family can’t wait to revisit in the summer!

I'm not sure where to start with this place because it was absolutely amazing. If you're from Minnesota this is your dream cabin. If you're not from MN this is the best place to experience the northern lake life. Not only is this the best cabin I've ever stayed in, it also had every amenity you could ask for. If we had gone grocery shopping before our trip I don't think we would have left. We didn't have a boat but definitely going to book again so we can come back with and get out on the lake!
Alexandria is also 15 minutes away which has tons of really cool shops. We ended up getting coffee and breakfast one morning at a place called the Edge co. which was really good. I think our favorite was Carlos Creek Winery (which was literally 4 minutes from the cabin). Not only is it a massive winery but it also has a brewery and a pizza place. They had live music and plenty of room for my son to run around while we could watch him and enjoy some drinks!
I almost don't want people to find out how great this place is so I can book again without others trying to take prime weekends. Can't wait to come back.

My 10-year-old daughter wanted to review the stay and she said, “not only was the place esthetically beautiful to the eyes, the comfort of the home was just as relaxing, I didn’t want to leave the home at all.” Thank you for sharing your place with us. Our kids and in-laws enjoyed the comfort of your home. Our favorite part was seeing the deers from the balcony in the early mornings, and watching the black squirrels run around in the backyard. The water was very clear and shallow enough to swim with little ones. We enjoyed the winery and country blossom while there. We cooked all of our meals there, as you had everything available for us to do so. We hope to visit again, especially during the summer to jump in the lake.

This little A Frame cabin is as adorable as they come. Great place for a ladies weekend getaway! The space was perfect for relaxing & the the open concept allowed us to hang out with entire group with plenty of room to socialize & sit. The kitchen has everything a person could need to entertain and cook. Wineries, restaurants, and shopping is a quick car-ride away. Definitely an Airbnb gem in the Alexandria area!
Thank you for sharing your lovely place with us to relax and recharge. 🥰
